nodes.text: Logray's antidote was a potion developed by the Ewok Logray, Shaman of the Bright Tree Village, to counter a poisonous brew created by his archfoe, the Tulgah witch named Morag. With her own potion, Morag had poisoned the Ewoks' berry bushes in order to deprive them of their favorite food. Logray, however, was able to prepare an antidote that not only disinfected the fruits, but also made the repellent to the witch.
